pam.name: Pamela Barone Stover
pam.title: DPM
pam.bio: Dr. Stover is thrilled to continue her father's private practice and carry on the 40 year tradition of excellent podiatric care to the next generation. In her spare time she enjoys cooking, traveling, and spending time with her family.
specialties: Diabetic Wound Care and Limb Salvage
